slides.title: Description Lists
slides.content:
# Description Lists ğŸ“–

A list of terms, with a description of each term.

- `<dl>`: Description List
- `<dt>`: Term (Name)
- `<dd>`: Description (Details)

```html
<dl>
  <dt>Coffee</dt>
  <dd>Black hot drink</dd>
  <dt>Milk</dt>
  <dd>White cold drink</dd>
</dl>
```
